member.name: T:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainer
member.summary: Base class for component containers. Provides storage for components and initialization services

member.name: T:JetBrains.Application.Components.IComponentContainer
member.summary: Interface for abstract component container

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainer.myInterfaceMap
member.summary: Looks up implementation type by interface type

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainer.myId
member.summary: Container ID for diagnostics

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainer.myLifetime
member.summary: Lifetime of this container

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainer.myChainedContainers
member.summary: Containers to chain to

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainer.myDispatcher
member.summary: Marks the container's thread affinity.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainer.myState
member.summary: Current livetime state for this container

member.name: M:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainer.Compose
member.summary: Initializes the components in the container.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainer.LazyDescriptor.TryExtractTypeUnderLazy(System.Type)
member.summary: If is a lazy type, extracts the type it lazily creates (its generic parameterization type). In case it looks like lazy but is not lazy (e.g. from newer system libs), issues an exception. If it's just clearly a non-Lazy type, yields NULL.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.CatalogueComponentContainer.myCatalogueSet
member.summary: Catalogue set used to retrieve parts from

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.CatalogueComponentContainer.mySelector
member.summary: Selects subset of parts to instantiate, e.g. handles parts overrides

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.CatalogueComponentContainer.myPartsFilter
member.summary: Filter applied to select parts for this component container

member.name: M:JetBrains.Application.Components.CatalogueComponentContainer.AttachParts(JetBrains.DataFlow.Lifetime,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{JetBrains.Application.Parts.PartCatalogueType})
member.summary: The sink sees new items in the collection view.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentState.Null
member.summary: The component has just been created, it has not been initialized yet. Cannot be returned from GetComponent in this state. If queried from the Primary thread, initializes the component; on other threads, fails.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentState.Initializing
member.summary: We're currently initializing the component. Can be queried on the Primary thread only if there're no nested component initializations (because such a condition means a circular dependency); on other threads, fails.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentState.Initialized
member.summary: The component has been initialized and its instance is accessible from any thread.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentState.Corrupted
member.summary: We attempted to init the component, but it has failed to complete its Init.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentState.Disposing
member.summary: The component is currently being disposed

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentState.Disposed
member.summary: The component was disposed and no longer accessible

member.name: M:JetBrains.Application.Components.FactoryComponentContainer.CreateInstance``1(JetBrains.DataFlow.Lifetime,JetBrains.Application.Components.IComponentContainer,System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates an object instance of type , injecting it with custom arguments and components from the parent container.
member.typeparam: Type of the object to create.
member.param: Defines the lifetime for the object that will be created. The object gets it in the constructor.
The parent component container to define the set of components that could be imported in the object constructor.
Additional custom actual parameters to be passed to the object constructor. These take precedence over parent container components. Note that currently there is no indication of unused parameters.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Application.Components.FactoryComponentContainer.CreateInstance(JetBrains.DataFlow.Lifetime,System.Type,JetBrains.Application.Components.IComponentContainer,System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates an object instance of type , injecting it with custom arguments and components from the parent container.
member.param: Defines the lifetime for the object that will be created. The object gets it in the constructor.
Type of the object to create.
The parent component container to define the set of components that could be imported in the object constructor.
Additional custom actual parameters to be passed to the object constructor. These take precedence over parent container components. Note that currently there is no indication of unused parameters.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Application.Components.DeferredComponentDescriptor
member.summary: Defers evaluation of the component instance until it's resolved. Could be used e.g. for deferring VS service query (and loading corresponding VS packages) until we actually need the service.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainerEx.TryGetComponent``1(JetBrains.Application.Components.IComponentContainer)
member.summary: Gets the component whose interface type is . Returns Null if there is no such component, or there are multiple components

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainerState.Initial
member.summary: The container has just been created and is not ready for creating the components yet. Call to proceed.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainerState.Initialized
member.summary: The container is running. The first pack of components has been created.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainerState.Disposing
member.summary: has been called on the container, and it's currently in the process of tearing down the components.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Application.Components.ComponentContainerState.Disposed
member.summary: The container has destroyed all of the components and is functional no more.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Application.Components.IComponent
member.summary: Base component interface.

summary.para: Initializes the component. Called by the component container after the component is created.
is the pairing method that's guaranteed to be called by the component container to tear down your component.
You must not access other components before your method is called.
All of the components that you access from are guaranteed to exist when your is called. Any other component might be missing by that time, and trying to get it will throw an exception.
